com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Class ServerOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql.ServerOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, ServerOperations

    public class ServerOperationsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, ServerOperations
    Contains methods to allow various operations on Azure SQL Database Servers.
